writeups.title: Cap
writeups.description: Comprometimento total de servidor Linux através de falha de controle de acesso, captura de credenciais em texto claro e escalação de privilégios via capability mal configurada.

writeups.title: Lame
writeups.description: Máquina Linux com Samba 3.0.20 vulnerável a RCE (CVE-2007-2447), permitindo shell root direto sem autenticação via injeção de comandos no campo username.

writeups.title: Nibbles
writeups.description: Servidor Linux com Nibbleblog 4.0.3 vulnerável a upload arbitrário de arquivos via credenciais padrão, escalando para root através de permissão sudo mal configurada.

writeups.title: Blue
writeups.description: Blue, while possibly the most simple machine on Hack The Box, demonstrates the severity of the EternalBlue exploit, which has been used in multiple large-scale ransomware and crypto-mining attacks since it was leaked publicly.

writeups.title: Mr Robot CTF
writeups.description: Mr Robot CTF is a vulnerable Linux machine designed to teach fundamental penetration testing skills through a pop-culture themed challenge. The machine simulates a real-world scenario where attackers must enumerate services, exploit web vulnerabilities, and escalate privileges to achieve root access.
